#  Mirascope_V2_Llm API

The `llm` module for writing provider-agnostic LLM Generations.

This module provides a unified interface for interacting with different LLM providers,
including messages, tools, response formatting, and streaming. It allows you to write
code that works with multiple LLM providers without changing your application logic.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="Agent" /> Agent

Agent class for generating responses using LLMs with tools.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="AsyncAgent" /> AsyncAgent

Asynchronous agent class for generating responses using LLMs with tools.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="AsyncStructuredAgent" /> AsyncStructuredAgent

Asynchronous structured agent class for generating structured responses using LLMs with tools.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="StructuredAgent" /> StructuredAgent

Structured agent class for generating structured responses using LLMs with tools.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="agent" /> agent

The `Agent` class for LLM agents.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="AsyncCall" /> AsyncCall

A class for generating responses using LLMs asynchronously.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="AsyncStructuredCall" /> AsyncStructuredCall

A class for generating structured responses using LLMs asynchronously.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="Call" /> Call

A class for generating responses using LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="StructuredCall" /> StructuredCall

A class for generating structured responses using LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="call" /> call

The Call module for generating responses using LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="Context" /> Context

Context for LLM calls.

## <ApiType type="Module" path="index" symbolName="context" /> context

The Context module for providing context to LLM calls during generation.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="Message" /> Message

A message in an LLM interaction.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="assistant" /> assistant

Shorthand method for creating a `Message` with the assistant role.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="system" /> system

Shorthand method for creating a `Message` with the system role.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="user" /> user

Shorthand method for creating a `Message` with the user role.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="LLM" /> LLM

The base interface for LLM models.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="Client" /> Client

The base interface for LLM clients.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="Params" /> Params

The base interface for LLM parameters.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="model" /> model

Set the model context with the model of the given id.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="DynamicConfig" /> DynamicConfig

Class for specifying dynamic configuration in a prompt template method.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="prompt_template" /> prompt_template

Prompt template decorator for writing messages as a string template.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="ResponseFormat" /> ResponseFormat

Class representing a structured output format for LLM responses.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="response_format" /> response_format

Decorator that defines a structured response format for LLM outputs.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="AsyncStream" /> AsyncStream

An asynchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="AsyncStructuredStream" /> AsyncStructuredStream

An asynchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="Response" /> Response

The response generated by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="Stream" /> Stream

A synchronous stream of response chunks from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="StreamChunk" /> StreamChunk

A chunk of a streaming response from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="StructuredStream" /> StructuredStream

A synchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="Tool" /> Tool

Tool instance with arguments provided by an LLM.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="ToolDef" /> ToolDef

Protocol defining a tool that can be used by LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="index" symbolName="tool" /> tool

Decorator that turns a function into a tool definition.
